title: Client closes when i press Home/play again from the post-game lobby. Solution?
body: When i press home or play again after a game the client closes. It has only been happening this patch. It happens when im in the post game lobby.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is disconnecting from the game platform service entirely, which crashes your client. There are a number of local network configurations that could cause this issue, so I recommend working through our comprehensive [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this.

Let me know if you still have issues after taking those steps.
i logged into my smurf and it was working. still did not work on my main account.

Since you're still encountering issues with this, I recommend submitting a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attaching a zipped set of logs using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).
